Plan: Day 1: Squats (4 sets, 8-12 reps, 2 min rest), Bench Press (4 sets, 8-12 reps, 2 min rest), Bent-over Rows (3 sets, 10-12 reps, 90 sec rest), Overhead Press (3 sets, 10-12 reps, 90 sec rest), Barbell Curls (3 sets, 12-15 reps, 60 sec rest).
Suggestions: Focus on form to maximize muscle activation. Use a spotter for heavy lifts like squats and bench press. Include 10 min of dynamic stretching before and static stretching after.

Plan: Day 1: Squats (4 sets, 8-12 reps, 2 min rest), Leg Press (3 sets, 10-12 reps, 90 sec rest), Calf Raises (3 sets, 15-20 reps, 60 sec rest), Leg Curls (3 sets, 12-15 reps, 90 sec rest). Day 2: Bench Press (4 sets, 8-12 reps, 2 min rest), Incline Dumbbell Flyes (3 sets, 10-12 reps, 90 sec rest), Tricep Dips (3 sets, 12-15 reps, 60 sec rest), Lateral Raises (3 sets, 12-15 reps, 60 sec rest).
Suggestions: Increase weight progressively each week. Consume 1.6-2.2g protein per kg body weight daily. Foam roll for 5-10 min post-workout to aid recovery.

Plan: Day 1: Squats (4 sets, 8-12 reps, 2 min rest), Bench Press (4 sets, 8-12 reps, 2 min rest), Bent-over Rows (3 sets, 10-12 reps, 90 sec rest), Overhead Press (3 sets, 10-12 reps, 90 sec rest), Plank (3 sets, 60 sec, 60 sec rest). Day 2: Deadlifts (4 sets, 6-10 reps, 2 min rest), Pull-ups (3 sets, 8-12 reps, 90 sec rest), Incline Dumbbell Press (3 sets, 10-12 reps, 90 sec rest), Barbell Curls (3 sets, 12-15 reps, 60 sec rest), Face Pulls (3 sets, 12-15 reps, 60 sec rest). Day 3: Leg Press (4 sets, 10-12 reps, 2 min rest), Dumbbell Lunges (3 sets, 12 reps per leg, 90 sec rest), Seated Cable Rows (3 sets, 10-12 reps, 90 sec rest), Lateral Raises (3 sets, 12-15 reps, 60 sec rest), Tricep Pushdowns (3 sets, 12-15 reps, 60 sec rest).
Suggestions: Track lifts for progressive overload. Use a spotter for heavy compounds like deadlifts. Incorporate 10 min of mobility work post-workout to prevent injury.

Plan: Day 1: Squats (4 sets, 8-12 reps, 2 min rest), Leg Extensions (3 sets, 12-15 reps, 90 sec rest), Calf Raises (3 sets, 15-20 reps, 60 sec rest), Romanian Deadlifts (3 sets, 10-12 reps, 90 sec rest). Day 2: Bench Press (4 sets, 8-12 reps, 2 min rest), Incline Dumbbell Flyes (3 sets, 10-12 reps, 90 sec rest), Tricep Pushdowns (3 sets, 12-15 reps, 60 sec rest), Dumbbell Shoulder Press (3 sets, 10-12 reps, 90 sec rest). Day 3: Deadlifts (4 sets, 6-10 reps, 2 min rest), Lat Pulldowns (3 sets, 10-12 reps, 90 sec rest), Face Pulls (3 sets, 12-15 reps, 60 sec rest), Hammer Curls (3 sets, 12-15 reps, 60 sec rest). Day 4: Overhead Press (4 sets, 8-12 reps, 2 min rest), Dumbbell Lateral Raises (3 sets, 12-15 reps, 60 sec rest), Barbell Curls (3 sets, 12-15 reps, 60 sec rest), Cable Crossovers (3 sets, 12-15 reps, 90 sec rest).
Suggestions: Prioritize recovery with 8+ hours of sleep. Use a lifting belt for heavy squats and deadlifts. Add 5 min of core work after each session for stability.

Plan: Day 1: Squats (4 sets, 8-12 reps, 2 min rest), Leg Press (3 sets, 10-12 reps, 90 sec rest), Calf Raises (3 sets, 15-20 reps, 60 sec rest), Leg Curls (3 sets, 12-15 reps, 90 sec rest). Day 2: Bench Press (4 sets, 8-12 reps, 2 min rest), Incline Dumbbell Flyes (3 sets, 10-12 reps, 90 sec rest), Tricep Dips (3 sets, 12-15 reps, 60 sec rest), Cable Crossovers (3 sets, 12-15 reps, 90 sec rest). Day 3: Deadlifts (4 sets, 6-10 reps, 2 min rest), Lat Pulldowns (3 sets, 10-12 reps, 90 sec rest), Face Pulls (3 sets, 12-15 reps, 60 sec rest), Dumbbell Rows (3 sets, 10-12 reps, 90 sec rest). Day 4: Overhead Press (4 sets, 8-12 reps, 2 min rest), Dumbbell Lateral Raises (3 sets, 12-15 reps, 60 sec rest), Skull Crushers (3 sets, 12-15 reps, 60 sec rest), Rear Delt Flyes (3 sets, 12-15 reps, 60 sec rest). Day 5: Barbell Rows (4 sets, 8-12 reps, 2 min rest), Pull-ups (3 sets, 8-12 reps, 90 sec rest), Hammer Curls (3 sets, 12-15 reps, 60 sec rest), Plank (3 sets, 60 sec, 60 sec rest).
Suggestions: Track lifts to ensure progressive overload. Consume 1.6-2.2g protein per kg body weight daily. Prioritize 8-10 min of foam rolling post-workout.

Plan: Day 1: Squats (4 sets, 8-12 reps, 2 min rest), Leg Press (3 sets, 10-12 reps, 90 sec rest), Calf Raises (3 sets, 15-20 reps, 60 sec rest), Romanian Deadlifts (3 sets, 10-12 reps, 90 sec rest). Day 2: Bench Press (4 sets, 8-12 reps, 2 min rest), Dumbbell Flyes (3 sets, 10-12 reps, 90 sec rest), Tricep Pushdowns (3 sets, 12-15 reps, 60 sec rest), Incline Bench Press (3 sets, 10-12 reps, 90 sec rest). Day 3: Deadlifts (4 sets, 6-10 reps, 2 min rest), Pull-ups (3 sets, 8-12 reps, 90 sec rest), Seated Rows (3 sets, 10-12 reps, 90 sec rest), Face Pulls (3 sets, 12-15 reps, 60 sec rest). Day 4: Overhead Press (4 sets, 8-12 reps, 2 min rest), Lateral Raises (3 sets, 12-15 reps, 60 sec rest), Barbell Curls (3 sets, 12-15 reps, 60 sec rest), Dumbbell Shoulder Press (3 sets, 10-12 reps, 90 sec rest). Day 5: Romanian Deadlifts (4 sets, 8-12 reps, 2 min rest), Leg Curls (3 sets, 12-15 reps, 90 sec rest), Plank (3 sets, 60 sec, 60 sec rest), Leg Extensions (3 sets, 12-15 reps, 90 sec rest). Day 6: Incline Bench Press (4 sets, 8-12 reps, 2 min rest), Cable Crossovers (3 sets, 12-15 reps, 90 sec rest), Overhead Tricep Extensions (3 sets, 12-15 reps, 60 sec rest), Lateral Raises (3 sets, 12-15 reps, 60 sec rest).
Suggestions: Split sessions into 45 min lifting + 15 min mobility. Ensure proper warm-up sets for heavy lifts. Use a lifting belt for heavy compounds.

Plan: Day 1: Squats (4 sets, 8-12 reps, 2 min rest), Leg Press (3 sets, 10-12 reps, 90 sec rest), Calf Raises (3 sets, 15-20 reps, 60 sec rest), Romanian Deadlifts (3 sets, 10-12 reps, 90 sec rest). Day 2: Bench Press (4 sets, 8-12 reps, 2 min rest), Dumbbell Flyes (3 sets, 10-12 reps, 90 sec rest), Tricep Pushdowns (3 sets, 12-15 reps, 60 sec rest), Cable Crossovers (3 sets, 12-15 reps, 90 sec rest). Day 3: Deadlifts (4 sets, 6-10 reps, 2 min rest), Pull-ups (3 sets, 8-12 reps, 90 sec rest), Seated Rows (3 sets, 10-12 reps, 90 sec rest), Face Pulls (3 sets, 12-15 reps, 60 sec rest). Day 4: Overhead Press (4 sets, 8-12 reps, 2 min rest), Lateral Raises (3 sets, 12-15 reps, 60 sec rest), Barbell Curls (3 sets, 12-15 reps, 60 sec rest), Rear Delt Flyes (3 sets, 12-15 reps, 60 sec rest). Day 5: Romanian Deadlifts (4 sets, 8-12 reps, 2 min rest), Leg Curls (3 sets, 12-15 reps, 90 sec rest), Plank (3 sets, 60 sec, 60 sec rest), Leg Extensions (3 sets, 12-15 reps, 90 sec rest). Day 6: Incline Bench Press (4 sets, 8-12 reps, 2 min rest), Cable Crossovers (3 sets, 12-15 reps, 90 sec rest), Overhead Tricep Extensions (3 sets, 12-15 reps, 60 sec rest), Dumbbell Flyes (3 sets, 10-12 reps, 90 sec rest). Day 7: T-Bar Rows (4 sets, 8-12 reps, 2 min rest), Dumbbell Rows (3 sets, 10-12 reps, 90 sec rest), Rear Delt Flyes (3 sets, 12-15 reps, 60 sec rest), Hammer Curls (3 sets, 12-15 reps, 60 sec rest).
Suggestions: Split sessions into 45 min lifting + 15 min mobility/core work. Ensure 1-2 rest days weekly to prevent overtraining. Use a lifting belt for heavy compounds.

Plan: Day 1: Treadmill Intervals (20 min: 1 min sprint, 2 min jog, repeat), Bodyweight Squats (3 sets, 15-20 reps, 60 sec rest), Push-ups (3 sets, 12-15 reps, 60 sec rest), Plank (3 sets, 45-60 sec, 60 sec rest), Mountain Climbers (3 sets, 30 sec, 60 sec rest).
Suggestions: Maximize HIIT intensity for calorie burn. Stay hydrated during cardio. Add 5-10 min of stretching post-workout to improve flexibility.

Plan: Day 1: Treadmill Intervals (20 min: 1 min sprint, 2 min jog, repeat), Bodyweight Squats (3 sets, 15-20 reps, 60 sec rest), Push-ups (3 sets, 12-15 reps, 60 sec rest), Bicycle Crunches (3 sets, 20 reps per side, 60 sec rest). Day 2: Stationary Bike HIIT (20 min: 30 sec max effort, 1 min easy, repeat), Dumbbell Lunges (3 sets, 12 reps per leg, 60 sec rest), Plank (3 sets, 45-60 sec, 60 sec rest), Mountain Climbers (3 sets, 30 sec, 60 sec rest).
Suggestions: Maintain a 500-700 calorie deficit. Pair workouts with 5 min of low-intensity cool-down. Monitor heart rate during HIIT to stay in fat-burning zone.

Plan: Day 1: Treadmill Intervals (20 min: 1 min sprint, 2 min jog, repeat), Bodyweight Squats (3 sets, 15-20 reps, 60 sec rest), Push-ups (3 sets, 12-15 reps, 60 sec rest), Plank (3 sets, 45-60 sec, 60 sec rest), Bicycle Crunches (3 sets, 20 reps per side, 60 sec rest). Day 3: Jump Rope (15 min: 1 min fast, 1 min slow, repeat), Kettlebell Swings (3 sets, 15-20 reps, 60 sec rest), Incline Push-ups (3 sets, 12-15 reps, 60 sec rest), Side Plank (3 sets, 30 sec per side, 60 sec rest), Burpees (3 sets, 10-12 reps, 60 sec rest).
Suggestions: Maintain high intensity during HIIT for max calorie burn. Stay hydrated during cardio. Add 5-10 min of stretching post-workout to improve flexibility.
